definitions.definition: pots, dishes, and other articles made of earthenware or baked clay. Pottery can be broadly divided into earthenware, porcelain, and stoneware.
examples: china, crockery, ceramics, earthenware, stoneware a collection of antique pottery

definitions.definition: the craft or profession of making pottery.
examples: courses include drawing, painting, and pottery

definitions.definition: a factory or workshop where pottery is made.
